item.description:
Decided just this morning to go see The Honors at The Green Dragon TONIGHT. They play every Sunday night and are a really fun cover band. The Green Dragon does not charge cover.  Band starts at 9:30pm and I should be there about 8:30 or so.

 

Come on down to hear some awesome music!! The Green Dragon is conveniently located in the Haymarket, very close to the Haymarket station (Orange and Green Line), Government Center (Green and Blue Lines), and a short walk from Park Street (Red and Green Lines).  Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink. PLEASE PAY AS YOU GO OR MAINTAIN A SEPARATE TAB.

 

Thanks! Hope to see you there!  -Isabel
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture or ask bartender to point me out
item.name: *LAST MINUTE MEETUP* Live Music with THE HONORS at the Green Dragon
